mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_INQUIRY_ANSWER ( INQUIRY_ANSWER_NO, INQUIRY_ANSWER , NICKNAME, REF_INO ) VALUES ( #{inquiryAnswerNo}, #{inquiryAnswer}, #{nickName}, #{refIno} )
mapper.select: SELECT INQUIRY_ANSWER_NO inquiryAnswerNo, INQUIRY_ANSWER inquiryAnswer, NICKNAME nickName, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createDate FROM TB_INQUIRY_ANSWER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_INO = #{refIno} ORDER BY INQUIRY_ANSWER_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_INQUIRY_ANSWER SET ANSWER_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE INQUIRY_NO = ${inquiryNo} AND STATUS = 'N'
